Title: The Watcher
Plot: David Allen Griffin is a cool killer- time and time again, he chooses a female victim, studies her for weeks till he knows her routine to the smallest detail, makes meticulous preparations using his forensic knowledge to gain entr...
Writers: Darcy Meyers, David Elliot, Clay Ayers
Stars: James Spader, Keanu Reeves, Marisa Tomei
